short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Co-founder supports startup journey. Tailored prompts and Chrome Extension. Coming later, template and Deck AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your co-founder to support you along the way of your startup journey. In the first phase we are releasing helpful prompts to commonly asked questions by founders, alongside a Chrome Extension. For future development, we have in the roadmap to release features supporting the creation of templates and decks!
